common

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of static utility methods.

    • Field Summary

      static java.util.Random rng
      A random number generator to use in static utility methods.

    • Constructor Detail

        public Utils()

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomLineInFile

        public static java.lang.String getRandomLineInFile(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns a random line in a file given as a filename. Prints the stack trace if an IOException exception occurs. Returns the empty string if the given file is empty and null if an IOException occurred.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename for the file to get the random line from.
        Returns:
        A random line in the file given by the filename, the empty string if the file contains no lines, or null if an IOException occurred.

      • getRandomSize

        public static long getRandomSize(long upperBound)
                          throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns a random long in the range [0, upperBound) where upperBound is given to be a non-negative long.
        Parameters:
        upperBound - A non-negative long to serve as the upper bound for the random size generation.
        Returns:
        A random long in the range [0, upperBound) where upperBound is the given positive long.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the given upper bound is negative.

      • getRandomSize

        public static double getRandomSize(double upperBound)
                            throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Returns a random double in the range [0, upperBound) where upperBound is given to be a non-negative double.
        Parameters:
        upperBound - A non-negative double to serve as the upper bound for the random size generation.
        Returns:
        A random double in the range [0, upperBound) where upperBound is the given positive double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the given upper bound is negative.

      • getRandomBracket

        public static double getRandomBracket(double value,
                                      double giveOrTakePercentage)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a random double within a certain give-or-take percentage of a given value. For example, getRandomBracket(10.00, 0.10) will return random double in the range [9, 11).
        Parameters:
        value - The value.
        giveOrTakePercentage - The give-or-take percentage.
        Returns:
        A random double within a certain give-or-take percentage of the given value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given give-or-take percentage is not within the range [0, 1].
